reviews.review: Yeah this game is pretty epic,just recently got a pc but before I played dbd on playstation and had been in red ranks a bunch of times and I never got bored of it.Sure this game can honestly piss me off and I have broken a controller over it like a dumbass but i still play cuz this game is fun asf.

真的非常恐怖兄弟，里面有扔斧头的兔子，穿JK的妹妹，扛着音响的男人。。。。
懷念小時候和朋友一起玩的鬼抓人嗎? 這是一款真正的「鬼」抓人，鬼的目標是將四個人類掛上勾子獻給惡靈，而人類則是要找到並修好五台壞掉的發電機，才能開啟大門逃出地獄。遊戲緊張感十足，鬼靠近時根本分不清楚心跳聲是遊戲內的還是自己的，與朋友一起組隊更好玩。
Fun game is you play with your friend, but single, no

Você vai basicamente comprar um jogo onde o killer te engancha e fica igual uma estatua na sua frente.... A quantidade de partidas que eu fico o jogo inteiro sem poder mexer (sendo camperado ou deixado no chão) não ta escrito.

Прекрасная игра для всей семьи, рекомендую людям всех возрастов. Последнее обновление оставило странное впечатление. Новый маньяк больше похож на типичного Российского алкаша, чем на вселяющего страх маньяка, что не оставит тебе шанса на жизнь. Новые гены и анимации с ними просто шикарны, чего стоят те проводки, которые мы соединяем. А так игра давно превратилась из страшной соревновательной игры на выживание в обычные догонялки с маньяком. Одни просто скучно сидят и чинят 5 генераторов(очень интересный геймплей), а другой бегает как угорелый. Многие же издеваются над бедным маньяков, что не может ничего сделать, ведь в первые 3 минуты игры уже заводятся почти все чертовы генераторы. И никакие перки его не спасают. А те кто играют за пеших манов, вообще суицидники. В ОБЩЕМ хорошее комьюнити, хороший баланс, крутые генераторы, и главное классные разработчики, чисто ставлю клас
Хорошая игра, а если маньяк рак, то играть вообще кайф )0)
игра для маньяков,я вот убил своего друга в реальной жизни.Игра крутая советую. by manyak

This was one of my favorite games for about the past 2 years. Its a shame that the devs have no idea how make games. They are obsessed with the idea of nerfing everything into the ground and making it boring as possible. God forbid they buff other perks or rework maps. Not to mention they made the most boring part of the game(doing gens) longer, and now you have to sit on them for 50 more seconds because you know damn well that your team isn't going to do it. They've ruined progression that people have been working on since the game came out in 2016. Had all the teachable perks? Well not anymore buddy, you gotta redo the whole thing! Maybe one day they will get their act together but for now I'm done with this game.
Very fun game, would recommend it.  10/10

Великолепная игра, в которой многое зависит от тебя. Разработчики из ничего сделали скилозависимую игру, что вызывает у меня уважение. Могу порекомендовать эту игру тем, кому нравится издеваться либо над выжившими, либо над маньяком.

This is a true horror game. On the survivor side, it's one of the scariest and most intense games I've ever played. It's full of moments that make you laugh and make you panic, it's very tense and exciting. It's true to the horror movie experience in a way nothing else is. In a way, the game is at its most fun when you don't know exactly what you're doing. The Survivor portion functions both as one of the best stealth experiences, and one of the best running experiences in a modern game. It's like playing Metal Gear Solid on hard but the guard is a real person. But if you prefer to run, chase, and take action, that's also 100% viable. 

On the killer side of things, it's also incredibly fun. I love stalking people, hunting them down, scaring them, chasing them around. It's really unique in that there's not explicitly a winning objective, though killing as many survivors as possible is encouraged. Each killer has a unique way of doing things, and unique feel to them in both design and skills. 

The lore of the game is great, the killers are interesting, the cosmetics are fun. Robbie Legion (Susie) and Harajuku Nea are my favorites. If you love horror, this is probably one of the best modern horror games there are. Queue are usually speedy at almost all hours, you can play with friends on console, the game is regularly updated. 

The Neutral is that this game has a lot of DLC. They are by no means necessary, I have several friends who are high rank killers without having a lot of the meta characters and perks. That being said, on sale this game is pretty cheap. 8 dollars for the base game which is totally playable can easily net you 50-100 hours. DLC isn't expensive and regularly goes on sale for 6 bucks. I've spent maybe 70 dollars total on this game, and gotten over 200 hours out of it. That's more than worth the cost when I'm not even close to done playing. 

The game is very skill based, however it's not a very hardcore game at the same time. It's most fun when you aren't playing ultra meta. Due to the way skills work in this game being completely swapable, memorizing what a survivor does is pointless, and memorizing what a killer does is not as useful as having a brain. That removes a large competitive element from the game. If you're looking for your next e-sport, look elsewhere. The strongest hardcore element of this game is the amount of strategy and mindgames that go into things, and being able to predict other people.

The main negative about this game is the community. They are whiny babies, who scream and throw tantrums. It's not so bad now since crossplay people can't chat in game, but certain types have an earned reputation for being very sore losers. This game makes you really feel things, so it's understandable some people would take it too seriously. At the same time, the community is also great fun to interact with, so it's definitely worth dealing with the negative for the fun experiences. If you really want, you don't even have to talk to them post game if you want. 

TL;DR this game is a true horror game with a lot of unique stuff going for it. If you love horror, and the idea of chase/be chased, hunt/be hunted, then this easily justifies the meager 8 bucks the game goes on sale for regularly. The game is constantly under development with free updates as well, including a graphics overhaul that's currently in progress and looks great so far. There's a lot of cute additions like survivors looking over their shoulder when they turn the camera behind them, and things that really add to the feel of a chase.
